title: It’s Fine Once in a While!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukuku…. So this place is a power spot that spews out magical power, huh…. This Yohane shall absorb all of the magical power here….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yoshiko-chan, this is the usual park zura. If you say something weird like power spot, people who came here to relax might get worried~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane. O mortals who mindlessly enjoy your everyday lives…. I shall turn all of you that have gathered here today into my little demons….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You can do that to us, but if you suddenly declare a normal person as a little demon, won’t they be freaked out? What do you think, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said! It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru loves “Yoshiko-chan” because it sounds cute~. That’s why Maru calls you Yoshiko-chan zura<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Lov-....! ….I see. Well, you are already one of Yohane’s little demon, Hanamaru, so you may call me whatever you like once in a while<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yaay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>But! You’re going to help me find the hidden magical power source here! Let’s go, Hanamaru!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s the usual treasure hunt, right~. Maru wonders what we’ll find today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
